title: Senior Product Devops Engineer
description:
• Ensure that each phase of the product lifecycle from product management, through development, QA, Staging and into Production is fully automated, as frictionless as possible utilizing CI and CD. 
• Provide metrics and dashboards into KPIs for tools and infrastructure while continuously improv- ing monitoring, self-healing, etc. 
• Code proactive infrastructure changes utilizing Infrastructure as Code ensuring they are archi- tected to implement 99.9% uptime and elastic scalability. 
• Establish and maintain the infrastructure to support automated unit, system and load testing.
requirements: • A minimum of 2 years of experience as a software developer or operations engineer using script- ing languages such as Ruby, Python, Shell, with at least 1 years setting up AWS environments.
